title: The Cameraman's Revenge
creator_credit: Wladyslaw Starewicz, Khanzhonkov and Aleksandr Khanzhonkov
brief_description: A jilted husband takes his revenge by filming his wife and her lover and showing the result at the local cinema. This was one of Starewicz’ first animated films, and stars a cast of animated beetles.

constellations_other.name: Storytime animated
constellations_other.description: Abra Cadabra was the world's first stereoscopic 3D film, but animators and filmmakers had experimented with the technology far earlier and continue to use other older techniques like stop-motion animation.
